title: about me
text:
MarkDown Basics
#’ — #’ title: Palmer Penguins #’ author: Norah Jones #’ date: 3/12/23 #’ format: html #’ —
library(palmerpenguins)
#’ ## Exploring the data #’ See ?@fig-bill-sizes for an exploration of bill sizes by species.
#| label: fig-bill-sizes #| fig-cap: Bill Sizes by Species #| warning: false library(ggplot2) ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, group = species)) + geom_point(aes(color = species, shape = species), size = 3, alpha = 0.8) + labs(title = “Penguin bill dimensions”, subtitle = “Bill length and depth for Adelie, Chinstrap and Gentoo Penguins at Palmer Station LTER”, x = “Bill length (mm)”, y = “Bill depth (mm)”, color = “Penguin species”, shape = “Penguin species”)

title: about me
text:
MarkDown Basics
#’ — #’ title: Palmer Penguins #’ author: Norah Jones #’ date: 3/12/23 #’ format: html #’ —
library(palmerpenguins)
#’ ## Exploring the data #’ See ?@fig-bill-sizes for an exploration of bill sizes by species.
#| label: fig-bill-sizes #| fig-cap: Bill Sizes by Species #| warning: false library(ggplot2) ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = bill_length_mm, y = bill_depth_mm, group = species)) + geom_point(aes(color = species, shape = species), size = 3, alpha = 0.8) + labs(title = “Penguin bill dimensions”, subtitle = “Bill length and depth for Adelie, Chinstrap and Gentoo Penguins at Palmer Station LTER”, x = “Bill length (mm)”, y = “Bill depth (mm)”, color = “Penguin species”, shape = “Penguin species”)

text:
paste your elevator pitch here A SHORT (4-5 SENTENCES) PARAGRAPH THAT DESCRIBES KEY INSIGHTS TAKEN FROM METRICS IN THE PROJECT RESULTS THINK TOP OR MOST IMPORTANT RESULTS.


Read and format project data
# Include and execute your code here
df = pd.read_csv("https://github.com/byuidatascience/data4names/raw/master/data-raw/names_year/names_year.csv")


Highlight the Questions and Tasks

title: Client Report - [Insert Project Title]
text:
QUESTION|TASK 1
COPY PASTE QUESTION|TASK 1 FROM THE PROJECT HERE
type your results and analysis here


Read and format data
# Include and execute your code here


include figures in chunks and discuss your findings in the figure.


plot example
# Include and execute your code here
chart = px.bar(df.head(200),
    x="name", 
    y="AK"
)
chart.show()



                                                
My useless chart




table example
# Include and execute your code here
mydat = df.head(1000)\
    .groupby('year')\
    .sum()\
    .reset_index()\
    .tail(10)\
    .filter(["year", "AK","AR"])

display(mydat)

title: Spencer Zapata
text:
Phone: +1 (630) 991-1262
Email: zapataspencer@gmail.com

title: Spencer Zapata Resume
text:
Student at BYUI and Data specialist at Ecolab.


Data Science, Business Intel, Coumputer Science

title: Spencer Zapata Resume
text:
Brigham Young University- Idaho.
January 2021 - now Brigham Young Univeristy, Rexburg

Student



Technical Skills. • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint). • Proficient in data visualization tools (Tableau, Power BI). • Skilled in programming languages (SQL, R, Python). • Skilled in Sap and WMS Systems Soft Skills. • Strong communication skills, both verbal and written. • Exceptional problem-solving abilities and critical thinking. • Effective time management and organizational skills. • Strong teamwork and collaboration in cross-functional settings. • Adaptability and resilience in fast-paced environments. • Fluent in Spanish, Portuguese, and English.

title: Isaac Newtons’s CV
text:
2012 President, Royal Society, London, UK
Associate, French Academy of Science, Paris, France

title: Isaac Newtons’s CV
text:
1669 Newton Sir I, De analysi per æquationes numero terminorum infinitas.
1669 Lectiones opticæ.
etc. etc. etc.



2012 Infinitesimal calculus for solutions to physics problems, SMBC patent 001

title: Spencer Zapata Resume
text:
Data Specialist April 2024 - Present Ecolab Naperville, IL • Utilized SAP and SQL to log and retrieve sample data efficiently, ensuring accurate data entry and retrieval. Assisted in data collection and performed analyses to support experimental findings and decision-making. • Conducted various laboratory experiments with precision, adhering to established protocols. Demonstrated proficiency in handling and using chemicals safely, maintaining a high standard of safety and compliance. • Applied meticulous attention to detail in proofreading data to uphold data integrity. Ensured accuracy and reliability in data reporting and documentation. • Leveraged technical skills to support data analysis and interpretation, contributing to development of comprehensive reports and insights.
University Ambassador September 2019 - July 2022 Brigham Young University Rexburg, Idaho • Volunteer. • Guided and mentored groups of 40 incoming students, facilitating orientation to university facilities, resources, and faculty members. • Organized campus tours and informational sessions to familiarize students with key locations and academic departments, ensuring a seamless integration into university life. • Addressed student concerns and enhanced overall university experience, contributing to a positive and welcoming campus environment for all. • Planned social activities and events to promote student engagement.
Logistic Analyst August 2021 - December 2021 LG Electronics Lockport, IL • Utilized SQL to manage and track shipping and inventory processes, ensuring accurate and up-to-date data for efficient logistics management. • Leveraged advanced Excel functions to clean and wrangle data, extracting meaningful insights to inform decision-making and generate comprehensive reports for company use. • Calculated price reduction lead times, enabling proactive cost-saving measures and increasing overall supply chain efficiency by 15 %. • Designed and implemented processes to boost operational efficiencies by executing statistical analysis using R, testing various methods to improve workflows, optimize resource allocation, and ultimately increase productivity.
Printing Supervisor September 2020 - December 2020 Occasions Group Rexburg, ID • Provided training sessions for 6 employees on operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting of company equipment. • Conducted thorough quality inspections of Christmas cards printed using printers, identifying, and rectifying errors promptly. Team errors went down 10%. • Trained employees on proper printer operation techniques, ensuring consistent print quality and adherence to production standards. employee productivity went up 25%. • Monitored and evaluated employee performance in relation to company goals, providing constructive feedback and support to promote quality work. • Utilized advanced Excel functions to forecast material demand, enabling accurate inventory management and streamlined production processes.
Inventory Control Lead April 2020 - September 2020 LG Electronics Lockport, IL • Utilized Excel macros to streamline inventory tracking processes, enhancing efficiency and accuracy. Implemented robust inventory tracking mechanisms resulting in a notable improvement, achieving inventory accuracy levels of 97%. • Conducted daily cycle counts to maintain inventory accuracy, identifying discrepancies and implementing corrective measures to improve data precision. • Optimized operations by maintaining warehouse management systems (WMS), enhancing efficiency in demand forecasting and inventory management, resulting in improved overall operational performance by 15 %.
Shipping Coordinator August 2018 - December 2019 LG Electronics Lockport, IL • Directed comprehensive training sessions to familiarize team members with company software, specifically the WMS system, resulting in a notable 12% increase in operational speed. • Audited team members’ work and troubleshooted any errors, reducing shipping errors by 20% before product was dispatched. • Organized load times to ensure orders were processed and audited at least 30 minutes before scheduled shipment, resulting in zero delays and seamless fulfillment of all orders.
Machine Operator September 2023 - April 2024 RR Donnelly St. Charles, Illinois • Operated and managed machinery to ensure smooth and efficient production processes. • Regularly cleaned and inspected equipment to prevent breakdowns and assure safety standards. • Met or exceeded daily and weekly production quotas, maintaining high levels of accuracy and quality. • Troubleshot minor mechanical issues, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity. • Collaborated with team members to improve workflow and assure timely completion of production goals.
